snippet.title: Samurai Slaughter House  [Lo-fi Trailer]
snippet.description:
Samurai Slaughter House is coming to PCVR, Oculus Quest, and Oculus Quest 2 in 2022.

I am planning on releasing a time limited free demo this year during one of the Steam festivals.
Make sure to wishlist the game on Steam so that you're notified when the demo is available so that you don't miss out!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1447400/Samurai_Slaughter_House/
